WorkItem.Description: I downloaded Rawr for the first time today and I'm having trouble using it (i keep getting errors). the first one i got was something to do with not having the .NET framework. i downloaded it from the Microsoft site and tried running Rawr again and got another error .NET Framework initialization error - Unable to find a version of runtime to run this application.

Comments.Message: That means that you did not install the .NET Framework. The easiest way to make sure that you have everything you need is to just run Windows Update until there are no remaining updates (and that's the best for your computer anyway)
